partnership.title: Partnership with Torah Adam L'Adam Institute
partnership.description: Ten10 was developed in partnership with the Torah Adam L'Adam Institute – one of the leading institutes in the field of practical halacha. The institute guided the entire development process and approved the accuracy of all halachic calculations in the system. Over a long period, the institute published various versions of Excel tables for tithe and chomesh calculations, which gained great public popularity with over 3,500 orders in Israel. Following the high demand and numerous requests, the institute decided to collaborate with an expert programmer to create a completely new system – modern, convenient, and advanced – that incorporates all the advantages of previous versions, alongside upgrades and new functions that will provide a fast, accurate, and pleasant user experience.

items.question: Is the application free?
items.answer: Yes, the application is completely free for personal use

items.question: Is an internet connection required?
items.answer: No, you can use the computer software without internet connection. The website version requires connection

items.question: How is my data protected?
items.answer: Data is encrypted and protected. In the computer software, it's stored locally on your computer

items.question: Can I import existing data?
items.answer: Yes, the system supports exporting and importing data from the website to the software and vice versa
